description:
The AirData Air Quality Index Summary Report displays an annual summary of Air Quality Index (AQI) values for counties or core based statistical areas (CBSA). Air Quality Index is an indicator of overall air quality, because it takes into account all of the criteria air pollutants measured within a geographic area. Although AQI includes all available pollutant measurements, you should be aware that many areas have monitoring stations for some, but not all, of the pollutants. Each row of the AQI Report lists summary values for one year for one county or CBSA. The summary values include both qualitative measures (days of the year having good air quality, for example) and descriptive statistics (median AQI value, for example).

Summary statistics for the current year are incomplete because data are still being reported and quality assured. Data for the current year are considered preliminary until May 1 of the following year. Therefore, comparing reported values for the current year with previous years may not be valid.

see https://www.epa.gov/outdoor-air-quality-data/about-air-data-reports for more information.
license:

name: 2022 US EPA Annual AQI by County

publisher.@value: US Environmental Protection Agency Public Domain

variableMeasured.description: The number of days PM2.5 was the main pollutant used to calculate the AQI.
variableMeasured.name: days_pm2.5

variableMeasured.description: Half of daily AQI values during the year were less than or equal to the median value, and half equaled or exceeded it.
variableMeasured.name: median_aqi

variableMeasured.description: The number of days Ozone was the main pollutant used to calculate the AQI.
variableMeasured.name: days_ozone

variableMeasured.description: The number of days NO2 was the main pollutant used to calculate the AQI.
variableMeasured.name: days_no2

variableMeasured.description: 90 percent of daily AQI values during the year were less than or equal to the 90th percentile value.
variableMeasured.name: 90th_percentile_aqi

variableMeasured.description: The maximum AQI in the county for the year.
variableMeasured.name: max_aqi

variableMeasured.description: The number of days CO was the main pollutant used to calculate the AQI.
variableMeasured.name: days_co

variableMeasured.description: Days with valid AQI index calculated.
variableMeasured.name: days_with_aqi

variableMeasured.description: The number of days PM10 was the main pollutant used to calculate the AQI.
variableMeasured.name: days_pm10
